name: Monster Party Crasher
description:
Wakey wakey sleepy head!

Our monster is not very amused about the noise townsfolk are making nowadays. Woken up from the deep slumber, our grumpy sweetheart marches through the city to turn off the menace!

Controls:

    • Push the bottom middle button to get the average noise in your room.
    • Use your voice to be loud enough to help our sleepy head to crush the annoying party floors.
    • Control the volume to reach the right floor.
    • Don't crush the wrong floor or police will get you.
    • Crush as many party floors as possible!

Update (22/Feb/2017):

    • fixed score, which was fixed at one scratch
    • added Achievements
Update (23/Mar/2017):
    • iOS-version (see link below)
